subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Kenny Lofton’s infield single against Joel Zumaya broke a scoreless tie with two outs in the 10th inning yesterday, and the Cleveland Indians went on to beat the host Detroit Tigers, 3-1.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Kenny Lofton’s infield single against Joel Zumaya broke a scoreless tie with two outs in the 10th inning yesterday, and the Cleveland Indians went on to beat the host Detroit Tigers, 3-1.
